name: 2024 the 7th International Conference on Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence
content: Conference Publication: Accepted papers will be published in PRAI 2024 Conference Proceedings, and submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex & Scopus. PRAI 2024 is listed in IEEE Official Conference Calendar, please via: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/62207
